General.Name: Yunnan Lincang Xinyuan Germanium Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Lincang Xinyuan Germanium Industry Co.,LTD engages in the research and development, deep processing, and germanium mining in China. It offers germanium single crystals and chips for solar cells; ultra-high-purity germanium single crystals; high-purity germanium detectors; infrared optical germanium precision components; infrared thermal imaging cameras; high-end new germanium products; and indium phosphide single crystals and chips, as well as high-efficiency concentrating solar battery modules, high-purity germanium dioxide, organic germanium, zone-fused germanium, high-efficiency concentrating solar battery modules, optical fiber germanium tetrachloride, high-purity gallium arsenide single crystals and wafers, and indium phosphide single crystals and wafers. The company also engages in the mining, processing, and sale of coal. Yunnan Lincang Xinyuan Germanium Industry Co.,LTD was founded in 1998 and is based in Kunming, China.
